duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain all property accounting and reporting, including collecting and posting rent, financial, and leasing reports, month end, pre close, bank deposits, and ensuring a balanced rent roll.
Use leasing and sales experience to lease apartments and promote resident satisfaction and retention by regularly responding to complaints, questions, and requests in a timely manner.
Lead and mentor the leasing team in leasing, closing, marketing, apartment files, and resident retention. Work closely with the Community Manager regarding all property operations.
